content: single_crochet across chain 1 turn - 10 single_crochet row 3 through 66 - repeat row 2 hold ends together taking care not to twist the band slip_stitch row 66 to beginning chain row turn band right side out working along edge of row chain 1 - single_crochet in each row of band for a total of 66 single_crochet join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch finish off rs hat body round 1 - join color 2 tree body to any single_crochet on rs of rib single_crochet row single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 66 single_crochet round 2 - chain 3 double_crochet in same st 1st v_stitch made chain 2 skip next 2 single_crochet v_stitch in next single_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 single_crochet around slip_stitch to 1st ch3 22 v-stitches 22 chain 2 spaces round 3 - chain 1 cs in 1st v_stitch same v_stitch as join ch1 skip next v_stitch cs in next v_stitch chain 1 around skip last v_stitch join with slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet on 1st v_stitch 11 cs 11 chain round 4 - chain 1 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space two rounds below behind first side of cs single_crochet in eye of cs 2 single_crochet in next chain 2 space two rounds below behind next side of cs single_crochet in center of v_stitch 2 rounds below working around chain 1 on previous round to anchor down chain around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet chain 1 turn 66 single_crochet round 5 - with ws facing half_double_crochet in the same st as join half_double_crochet in next 3 single_crochet changing to color 3 ornament colors at the end of 3rd half_double_crochet puff in next single_crochet closing puff with main body color changing back to color 2 half_double_crochet in next 5 single_crochet changing to color 3 in last half_double_crochet puff in next single_crochet closing puff by changing back to main body color around to last single_crochet half_double_crochet in the last single_crochet join with slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet break color 3 leaving a tail for sewing/weaving in 55 half_double_crochet 11 puff stitches chain 1 turn round 6 - with rs facing slip_stitch over to 1st puff chain 3 double_crochet in same puff 1st v_stitch made chain 2 skip 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next half_double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next puff chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next half_double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet 3 times v st in next puff chain 2 begin decrease as follows as v_stitch decrease skip 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet skip 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next puff st chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet skip next 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next puff decrease made chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next puff chain 2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet v_stitch in next half_double_crochet chain 2 4 times slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 20 chain 2 spaces 20 v-stitches round 7
